2020.title: OneFuzz
2020.description: OneFuzz is Microsoft’s open‑source fuzz‑testing framework released in September 2020, enabling continuous automated bug discovery on Windows and Linux platforms.

2020.title: Semgrep
2020.description: Semgrep, released in February 2020 as an evolution of sgrep, is an open‑source static code analysis tool supporting customizable, rule‑based detection across 30+ languages.

2020.title: KubiScan
2020.description: KubiScan, unveiled at Black Hat USA 2020, is an open‑source Kubernetes scanner that audits clusters for misconfigurations and privileged tokens.

2020.title: ATTPwn
2020.description: ATTPwn, introduced at Black Hat USA 2020, is an adversary emulation tool mapped to MITRE ATT&CK, aiding penetration testers in simulating ransomware‑style attacks.

2020.title: Psalm (taint analysis)
2020.description: Vimeo’s Psalm security tool added taint analysis in mid‑2020, enabling detection of XSS and SQL injection via trusted/untrusted input tracking in PHP codebases.

2020.title: Atheris
2020.description: Atheris is Google’s open‑source coverage‑guided fuzzer for Python and native extensions, first released in 2020 to help detect logic and memory errors.
